title: Is Mauser a make or brand of firearm as well as a type of firearm action? - Quora

response.answer_text: Mauser (the company) has been making guns since the 1870s (still in business). One of their more popular designs was the Mauser 98, which is a rifle originally made in 1898. Its innovation was the locking method of its bolt, which was more secure and safe than anything else in its day. They patented it, and licensed a bunch of other manufacturers to use their design, thus the term “Mauser action” came into common usage.

Mauser is a german firearms manufacturer. They also have a style of bolt action that they are known for “ mauser action" refers to the cock on close style action adobted by most modern bolt guns, it's super durable even though the action was designed in the 40s with the kar98 and 98k
